title: The Union
plot: Construction worker Mike is thrust into the world of espionage when his high school sweetheart, Roxanne, recruits him for a high-stakes intelligence mission.

subtitles.author: tubelecu
lines:
4819189 4820982 Get off me.
Remove your hand!
4823151 4824361 Get the intel!

subtitles.author: Nawaf_NM
lines: 20311 22772 [dramatic string music playing]
30030 31489 [music intensifies]
64689 65690 [elevator dings]
71738 73031 [music intensifies]

85126 89339 Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
Welcome to Trieste, Italy.

89422 92258 Looks like we've got a storm rolling in
off the Adriatic

92342 97430 and a missing CIA agent in room 620
of the Grand Hotel Castelletto.
97514 99516 This is London HQ.
99599 101476 We got a live feed up and running,
101559 102936 and we are good to go.

103019 105647 [quietly] This is Faraday.
Pickup crew on the sixth floor.

105730 108108 -Agent Hall, you have the field.
-[Hall] Copy that, boss.

108191 110568 Pickup team, give the signal
when you're in position.

110652 114739 Forty-five seconds. I wanna be in and out.
Vehicle team, be ready to move.
114823 115782 [man] In position.

115865 118493 Remember, I want
this piece of shit alive, Brennan.

118576 121871 Yeah. What is he,
a ringer on your CIA softball team?
121955 123123 [Faraday] In position.
123665 124707 Try not to shoot the guy.

124791 127001 You wanna pick up the tab
for his minibar too?

127085 130255 Yeah, yeah. Get a receipt.
I'm sure Langley will reimburse.
130755 132966 [Hall] Okay, everybody. Stand by.
133049 134467 [music subsides]
135343 137262 Faraday, ready to breach.
137345 138429 [music intensifies]

138513 140098 -On your knees!
-[man 1] On the ground!
140181 141057 [man 2] Area's secure.

141141 143268 -Please don't shoot!
-[man 2] Contact to target.
149566 150900 Hog-tied and ready to ride.
155363 156990 Confirmed. We have the hard drive.
157073 157907 Go for extraction.
157991 159367 [music intensifies]
162203 163621 [captive] I changed my mind.

163705 166124 I was gonna go to the embassy
and hand myself in.
166624 168918 Well, good news. We saved you a trip.
169002 170712 Traveling on the stairwell.

170795 173464 -Heads up, Rayner, they're coming to you.
-Copy that.
178636 180263 Five seconds until the exit.
189480 190732 What the hell happened?

191232 193902 [Hall] Rayner's down! Exit's compromised!
Go out the back.
193985 195278 [Faraday] Copy that.
196154 197572 [captive] What's going on?!
197655 198615 [man] Let's move!
199532 200909 [Faraday] What's our play?

202744 206789 -Backup extraction point at the canal!
-Better not lose that intel, Brennan.

206873 208583 -[Brennan] Just--
-[alarms ringing]
211461 212337 [bullet whistles]

213213 214672 -[man 1] He's hit!
-[woman] Glover's gone!

214756 216216 -[man 2] Call for backup!
-[man 3] Who is it?
216299 217383 We're taking fire!

217467 220220 Hold your position.
I can get ground support in five minutes.

220303 222222 -We can get to the canal in three.
-[Hall] You'll be in the open.

222305 223932 Seriously, Rox.
You gotta trust me on this.
226309 227769 Okay. Green light.

227852 229312 -Go!
-[Faraday] Let's move! Come on!

229395 231231 -[woman] Get him outta here!
-[man 2] On me!
234651 235902 [bullet whistles]
235985 237111 [man 2] Oh my God! Please!

237195 239739 [Brennan] Faraday, do you copy?
Nick, do you copy?

239822 241950 -[bullet whistles]
-Does anybody copy? Anybody?

242033 244702 -[Rox] Faraday, what's your location?
-[Brennan] Nick, where are you?
244786 245787 [bullet whistles]
250833 251793 [music intensifies]
251876 253628 [yells angrily]
254712 255797 [music subsides]

257799 261052 [Faraday] I'm at the extraction point.
I have the asset.
264430 266057 [captive breathing anxiously]
266140 266975 [bullet whistles]
267767 268643 [bullet whistles]
289622 290581 [music fades out]

290665 294585 [anchor] …time to go over to Dan
for today's outlook right across Jersey.

294669 296921 -Thank you, Mitch. I'm Dan Farrell…
-[soft thud]
297005 298089 [woman clears throat]
298172 299882 [weather report continues]

299966 301926 -Shit.
-I've made you coffee.
307265 308516 Are you kicking me out?

308599 311477 I'm too old for small talk
in the morning, Michael.

311978 315732 Last night was fun,
but… it ain't last night no more.
317150 318943 Goddamn, Nicole. That's cold.

324282 327410 Hey. When we first met,
did you ever think we'd hook up?

327493 332290 Uh, I was your seventh grade
English teacher, Mike. So… no.
332373 333875 You always passed me.

336044 339756 Look at you. You're still educating me
all these years later.
344427 345845 I'll see you around, huh?

345928 347972 -[Nicole] I imagine so!
-[laughs]
348056 350975 ["Lovely Day" by Bill Withers fading in]

352518 354103 -[Mike] Hey, Gary.
-Mike.

355897 357398 -Hey, Ma.
-[Nicole] Hey, honey.

358775 361235 That's a really nice suit.
You still working uptown?

361319 364655 -[Nicole] Gary works at the bank.
-Like as a teller?
364739 365823 Like as a manager.
373164 375875 ♪ When I wake up in the mornin', love ♪
378127 381130 ♪ And the sunlight hurts my eyes ♪
381214 382882 [engine starts]
382965 385843 ♪ And something without warnin', love ♪
387720 390223 ♪ Bears heavy on my mind… ♪

392642 394936 -Hey, Ma.
-Nicole Hoffman.

396062 398606 Jesus, Ma, you're like the feds.
You got eyes everywhere?

398689 401776 There's no secrets from your mother.
Not in Jersey.
402485 404987 Is her Gary still working at the bank?

405071 408199 No, they fired him. He's selling hot dogs
outside The Rock now.

408282 409826 -It's kinda sad, actually.
-[laughs]
409909 412161 When's the date for Ronnie's wedding?
412245 413496 A few weeks.

413579 417083 [Ma] No, I need to know the exact date.
I have to make my appointments.

417166 419168 -For what?
-[Ma] For the right nail tech.

419252 423965 You gotta book these things in advance.
I don't want them to stick me with Josie.

424549 426968 -Oh, not Josie, huh?
-[Ma] Don't be smart, kid.

427635 430721 -When's the wedding?
-Two weeks from Sunday. Bye.

430805 433474 ["The Promised Land"
by Bruce Springsteen playing]

438813 443234 ♪ On a rattlesnake speedway
In the Utah desert ♪

443317 447113 ♪ I pick up my money
And head back into town ♪

447196 451159 ♪ Driving 'cross
The Waynesboro county line ♪

451242 455580 ♪ I got the radio on
And I'm just killin' time ♪
455663 459542 ♪ Workin' all day in my daddy's garage ♪
459625 463963 ♪ Driving' all night chasin' some mirage ♪

464046 467884 ♪ But pretty soon, little girl
I'm gonna take charge ♪

467967 471846 ♪ The dogs on Main Street howl
'Cause they understand ♪

471929 476267 ♪ If I could take one moment
Into my hands ♪
476350 480730 ♪ Mister, I ain't a boy, no, I'm a man ♪
480813 484901 ♪ And I believe in a promised land ♪

485401 488321 ♪ I've done my best
To live the right way… ♪
489238 490490 Mrs. Hoffman?!

490573 494118 Ms. Hoffman, if you don't mind.
And, yes, I did. Twice.

494202 496037 -Wow.
-One and a half times at least.
496120 497705 I don't remember her from school.

497788 500333 If you didn't cut class every day,
maybe you'd remember.

500416 503169 If older women are your thing,
I know a couple of smoke shows
503252 505129 that play mahjong with my grandmother.
505213 506589 I'd love to date your grandmother.

506672 508508 [man 1] If you don't mind
having dinner at 4:30.

508591 510384 -[man 2] Oh!
-Why so late?

510885 513137 Hey, no, no, no.
No, no, no, no. I got this.
513221 515014 How, brother? You're as broke as me.

515097 517892 First, nobody's as broke as you.
You can barely pay attention.

517975 521521 And secondly, I got an advance today,
so it's all good.

521604 522897 -Thanks, Mike.
-Yeah.

522980 525316 -All right. I gotta drain the hog!
-[Mike] You do that.

525399 527485 I didn't know you got an advance.
Good for you.

527568 530821 What is this guy, dumb and ugly?
There's no advance. I'm broke as shit.

530905 534325 Billy's out of work. We'll split this.
Come on. Break out the lunch money.

535368 538120 [Brennan] Gotta be honest, Rox.
Not sure why this is our man.
538204 540248 I got a good feeling about him, boss.

540331 544168 If he's anything like that guy I remember,
he's exactly who we need.

544252 547046 -Hey, Jimmy. I need another.
-[Jimmy] Sure thing, Mike.
550466 551592 [door jangles]

552885 556764 First one to get a peanut in the glass
behind the bar buys the other one a drink.
562520 565606 Roxanne Hall. What are you doing here?

565690 568359 What does it look like I'm doing here?
I'm getting a drink!

570319 572405 -So, what, you're here by yourself?
-Yeah.
576033 576993 Date night?

577702 581247 I'm sorry. It's just…
it's just this is such a surprise, is all.

581330 584375 What's a surprise to me is you still got
the same haircut since high school.
584458 586043 Hey, hey, don't knock Supercuts.

586752 588337 -Two shots, please.
-[Jimmy] You got it.

588421 590798 -You can handle your liquor now?
-I always handled my liquor.

590881 593175 I got a vomit-stained tuxedo
that says different, but--

593259 595177 Wait, you still got your tuxedo
from high school?
596429 597555 And it still fits.
599140 601142 [Mike] This is so crazy.

601225 604437 I mean, I just… I pictured you walking
through that door a thousand times.
604520 605646 Is it as you imagined?

605730 607690 In my head,
you were always wearing a bikini, but…
607773 609317 [Rox chuckles]

610985 613362 Do you still breakdance
outside the rec center?

613446 616741 Every Saturday. And you know what?
The girls still love it too.
616824 618909 I don't remember any girls lovin' it.

618993 621829 -What about Isabella Mingarelli?
-She only liked you 'cause I liked you.

621912 624707 -You know this.
-No, she liked my moves. You know, that…
624790 625791 [vocalizing]

628210 631339 Oh my God.
She has six kids with Matty Museo.

632173 634216 -And another one on the way.
-What about you?

634300 635426 -What about me?
-You got kids?

635509 637845 Do I have kids?
No, I don't have any-- Do you?
637928 639805 Well, I don't know. None that I know of.

643434 645853 [laughs] Looks like
you're losing your touch.

645936 648189 I forgot how good
these disco fries actually were.

648272 651359 You forgot about a lot of good things
when you went off to college.
651442 653444 I guess Paterson didn't suit you, huh?

654487 657823 -I don't think college did either.
-I heard about that.
660076 661118 What'd you hear?

661202 665331 You got into a fight with the point guard
of the basketball team before the finals.
665414 666916 Broke his jaw. Got kicked out.

666999 670211 Well, actually, he was the center,
and I broke his nose.
671045 673172 Well, you can take the girl out of Jersey.

673255 676759 No, no, no. Wait. What happened was
he took my best friend on a date.

676842 678636 She couldn't remember a thing
in the morning.

678719 682390 People at school didn't care,
so… what happened happened.
682473 684392 So you threw away your college career?
686602 687520 Traded it in.
691565 693192 For doing the right thing.
694235 696654 What do you say we… call it a night?

697488 700408 What? No, we're just having fun.
You don't wanna finish the game?
700491 702326 I didn't say end the night, Mike.
702410 703494 I mean let's
704787 706247 take it somewhere else.

710751 713254 ["What I Like About You"
by the Romantics playing]
714130 715172 [Mike] Oh shit!
716674 718175 [laughs] Whoa!

718801 720761 If I'd known we were gonna do
the Gumball Rally,
720845 722179 I'd have had less disco fries!
729395 731355 [Rox] Wow, look at this place.
732648 734316 Remember that bench right there?
735943 737403 Where you first told me you loved me.

737486 740322 I was always trying to do
romantic stuff like that.
741198 743075 I'd do anything to make you smile.

746829 749623 Oh! I got-- I gotta take this.
If it wasn't important--

749707 752418 -Mike.
-It's gonna take one second. One second.
756922 758007 Just one second.

758090 760593 ["Jersey Girl" by Bruce Springsteen
& the E Street Band playing]

761177 763012 -Oh no!
-Come on. You loved this song.
763095 764138 No, don't sing it.

764221 768476 -♪ Got no time for the corner boys ♪
-[groans, laughs]
769769 772438 ♪ Down the street makin' all that noise ♪

772521 775983 -How did I fall for this?
-Oh, you were young and dumb.
776066 776984 I wasn't dumb.
781363 783449 God, I wish you hadn't left like you did.

783532 785951 -Sh-sh-sh! No, don't talk about that.
-All right.
786035 787953 Don't mess this up, Mikey. Come on.

788037 789330 -This is good.
-I'm sorry.
790206 791123 [Rox chuckles]

791207 795085 -♪ Cross the river to the Jersey side ♪
-♪ …to the Jersey side ♪

795169 797087 -[applause on telephone]
-[Rox chuckles]

797171 800090 -♪ Take my baby to the carnival ♪
-♪ …to the carnival ♪
800174 802051 I have a confession to make.

804512 807306 I did have an ulterior motive
for bringing you here.

807890 810643 Oh yeah? You tryin'
to whisk me away with you, huh?

814855 818108 -[Mike moans]
-Yeah, something like that.
822196 823280 Sorry, Mikey.
825741 828828 ♪ When I'm walking down the street ♪
829453 835376 ♪ Where you sing sha la la la la la la ♪

837253 843259 ♪ Sha la la la
I'm in love with a Jersey girl ♪
843843 845845 [music fades out, applause echoes]
845928 848681 [siren passing]
867241 868617 [bell tolling]
872830 873831 [Rox] Morning.
874665 876333 Welcome to London, Mikey.

876417 879295 Rox, what the hell?
Where… where did Jersey go?
879378 881922 Oh, it didn't go anywhere. You did.
884133 886802 No, no, no. We were… we were at the Point.

887344 890639 Remember I was being very charming?
"Jersey Girl" was playing--

890723 892933 And then I injected you
with a tranquilizer

893017 895895 and transported you here
via freight to the UK.
896979 898939 No, no. I should be at work.

899481 902109 I can't-- I can't be late again.
My foreman's gonna kill me.
902192 903694 [Rox chuckling]
905154 906822 [whimsical music playing]
915456 916582 [doorman whistles]
921337 923380 Hell of a wake-up call, huh, Mike?

924840 926717 -Who are you?
-Tom Brennan.

928260 929595 -What?
-I'm Roxanne's boss.

929678 931889 Although, sometimes,
it does not feel like that.
931972 933724 I'm a diligent follower of orders, boss.
933807 936268 Yeah, just not always the ones I'm giving.
936352 938020 What kind of think tank is this?

938103 941357 Think tank. That's good.
I usually tell people I'm a pilot.
941440 943067 He's got the hat and everything.

943651 945903 -What?
-Let me buy you breakfast. You drive.

948697 952242 -I need some answers.
-[Brennan] Okay, what do you wanna know?
952326 954119 What do you mean? Am I being kidnapped?

954203 956246 One way you can tell
if you're being kidnapped

956330 960084 is if a guy tosses you the keys
to a $200,000 sport utility vehicle
960167 962086 and offers to buy you breakfast.

965422 967758 I normally jimmy this shit
with a screwdriver.

967841 970761 -Where-- There's no place to put the key.
-Mike.
972346 973347 Right there.

975975 978560 Somebody needs to tell me
what the hell is going on.
978644 980771 Will do, Mike. Take a right.
980854 981981 [tires screech]
982064 982982 [car horn blares]

983065 984817 You might wanna try
driving on the right side.
984900 986568 Oh shit! Whoa, whoa, whoa! Shit!
986652 988195 [car horns blare]

990739 992992 -The hell is he doing?
-The right side is the left side.
993075 994743 Do you know how confusing you sound?

994827 996620 -First time in London?
-What do you think?

996704 999206 His first time
out of the tristate area. [laughs]

1001125 1003293 So you don't work
for an international think tank?
1003377 1005504 Nope. We work for the Union.

1006505 1008882 Half the intelligence community
don't know we exist.

1008966 1012177 -The other half regret finding out.
-You guys the FBI or something?
1012261 1014013 Yeah, except we do all the work,

1014096 1016682 and we don't wear coats
with our name in big yellow letters.

1016765 1018892 That sounds exciting for you,
but why am I here?
1018976 1021061 Because two nights ago, in Trieste, Italy,

1021145 1024648 a Union mission
to intercept a CIA turncoat went south.

1024732 1026483 -[Mike] That's why I'm in London?
-[Rox] Yep.
1026567 1027401 [Brennan] Basically.

1027484 1031321 I'm sorry for being a little slow here,
but you have to fill in the blanks, okay?
1031405 1033323 Tell you what makes the Union unique.

1033407 1035451 We don't recruit
out of Princeton or Harvard.

1035534 1039705 We're not looking to tap the Yale skulls
or the Oxford tennis team.

1039788 1042041 We're looking for people
that fly under the radar.

1042124 1044460 An invisible army
that keeps the world running.

1044543 1048047 People who do the actual work.
Street smarts over book smarts.
1048130 1050424 Blue collar, not blue blood.

1050507 1053719 People that build our cities,
keep production lines humming.
1054219 1056847 That's who we are… and we get shit done.

1057347 1059516 People like us
are expected to get shit done

1059600 1062269 'cause nobody ever handed us
anything a day in our lives.
1063145 1064229 What he said.
1064313 1066315 [pop music playing in café]

1066398 1070194 Hey, Maggie. We'll have three bacon rolls
and three black coffees for takeaway.
1070277 1071570 Ketchup or brown sauce?
1071653 1073155 Just ketchup, thank you.

1073238 1075741 -What the hell is a brown sauce?
-I have no idea.
1076533 1078619 Those guys over there, they work for you?

1078702 1080621 [Brennan] If they did,
you wouldn't have noticed 'em.

1081580 1084541 So look here. This is Derek Mitchell.
Former CIA analyst.

1084625 1086543 He was on the run
with top secret information.

1086627 1088504 -Guy you were tryin' to get in Trieste?
-Yep.

1088587 1090422 -Yeah, Trieste.
-Except you guys messed it up.
1091215 1093008 Yeah, we messed it up.

1094635 1097012 Now Mitchell has a hole
where his face used to be,

1097096 1099848 the intel is in the wind,
and we are up shit creek.
1101016 1102267 Know what they call that?

1102851 1106271 [Mike] I don't know.
Space Needle? Harry Potter Wand?

1106355 1109108 The BT Tower.
You know what the Union call it?
1116990 1118117 Look in here, Mike.
1121036 1123163 How did they get all of my shit like that?
1123664 1124665 Check this out.
1125165 1127835 Juliet Quinn, AKA the Auctioneer.

1127918 1130546 We found out she's selling the intel
on the black market in London
1130629 1132881 on behalf of a mystery seller.

1133674 1136802 The mystery seller being whoever killed
your guys and stole the intel.

1136885 1139304 Those are the kind of details
you're gonna have to remember
1139388 1140764 if you wanna pass the test.

1140848 1142641 -What test?
-The entrance test.
1142724 1143642 I don't like tests.
1143725 1144935 [dramatic music playing]

1146228 1147688 -[man 1] Same thing?
-[man 2] Yeah.
1147771 1149189 Wow! Holy shit!

1152568 1156697 In two weeks, that stolen intel's
gonna be sold at a black market auction
1156780 1158615 that we need to be a part of.

1159575 1162119 -That's where you come in.
-Hey, Athena.
1162202 1164163 What's he talking about, where I come in?

1164246 1167166 -Any underlying medical issues?
-Not that I know of.
1167249 1169501 Are you on any medications presently?
1169585 1170961 I got tranquilized last night.

1171044 1172504 -I don't know if that counts.
-Nope.

1172588 1175215 Hey, what did you mean by
"that's where I come in"?

1175841 1179261 That intel Mitchell stole
wasn't launch codes or blueprints
1179344 1180846 for some secret missile base.

1180929 1184725 It was… information
about every man and woman

1184808 1187561 who has ever served
a Western-allied country.

1188270 1191356 Every local cop,
every rifleman in the marines.
1191440 1196069 Every spook at MI5, MI6… FBI, CIA,
1196153 1197905 and, yeah, the Union.
1197988 1199990 That intel gets into the wrong hands,

1200073 1202701 our ability to protect the public
is history.

1203619 1205913 Here's the rub, Mike.
We need somebody clean.

1205996 1208373 If I send in somebody
that could turn up as Miss July

1208457 1211752 on the FBI's
most promising agents calendar this year,

1212377 1215464 they're gonna get their head blown off,
and the mission is DOA.
1216590 1218884 So we need somebody with no history.
1219468 1221303 Basically, we need a nobody.
1221386 1222429 [Brennan] Correct.
1226350 1227726 [Mike] Hey, what's up, big man?
1228227 1229937 Oh, what the-- Rox, what the hell?

1230020 1232147 -[man] You're a tough guy, huh?
-What? Hey!
1232231 1233357 Yeah, that's right.

1233440 1234733 -Bro. What?
-What's up, man?

1234816 1237819 Let me see how tough you are now.
Too pretty to be a tough guy.

1237903 1239446 Don't let the pretty face fool you.
I'm from the street.

1239529 1243283 Yeah? Which street is that?
Sesame Street? [laughs]

1245577 1249456 -Keep the new guy in one piece.
-There you go. Oh, you want some more?

1249539 1251667 Come on at me, Elmo.
Let's see what you got.
1253627 1254586 [man laughing]
1255170 1256546 Yeah, I can work with this.

1256630 1259091 This is Frank Pfeiffer,
physical specialist.

1259174 1261927 You were about to say you're not sure
if you're the guy for this,
1262010 1263971 and honestly, I think that's a good sign.

1264054 1267641 I'm not sure either,
but Roxanne believes you can do it, so…

1268433 1271270 You got till the end of the day
to make up your mind, okay?

1276817 1280279 You need a nobody, huh?
Why don't you get one of these people?

1280362 1283949 -I didn't mean that, Mike.
-No, you meant a nobody in a good way.

1285492 1288912 I mean, just yesterday, I'm waking up
next to Nicole Hoffman in Paterson.
1288996 1290622 I hadn't thought about you in forever.

1290706 1293500 Today, I'm in London, and you're asking me
to risk my life for you?

1293583 1296211 -None of this makes any sense.
-Wait. Let me get this straight.

1296295 1298714 You had sex
with our seventh grade English teacher?

1298797 1301842 -That is not the point, Roxanne.
-What is the point, Mike?
1301925 1304511 Why me? You haven't seen me in 25 years.

1304594 1308181 A guy who can be on a tiny beam
a thousand feet in the air

1308265 1311184 and keep his cool,
who used to be an all-star athlete.
1311268 1313437 A guy I remembered I could count on.

1313520 1316023 But I'm supposed to count on you.
You dropped out of my life.

1316106 1318942 I went to college!
Let's not make this thing overly dramatic.
1319026 1320902 No, no. You disappeared.
1320986 1322487 That was the Union. That wasn't me.

1322571 1324906 I didn't know that.
How was I supposed to know that?

1324990 1326783 -[poignant music playing]
-I'm sorry.

1327826 1330495 We're not asking you
for a lifetime commitment here.
1330579 1332748 It's one operation. That's it.

1341923 1345594 Look, first-class ticket to Newark,
leaves tonight.

1345677 1347804 You could be back
in Wilson's bar tomorrow.

1347888 1351141 Same bar, same stool, same friends.
Your choice.
1360692 1361943 [music intensifies]

1372371 1373705 -[cell phone buzzing]
-Oh!
1378752 1379836 Roxanne Hall?
1380712 1382714 Wait. Wa-- Ma, how do you know that?

1382798 1384257 -I know everything.

4868780 4870073 Oh, you can count on it.

4905609 4908570 Oh, you're making this

4966336 4969339 I could have taken you out in Trieste,

4969422 4972759 Didn't or couldn't?

4973259 4976596 -[Mike] Hey, Rox. Where are you?

4977639 4978556 What about you?
4978640 4980600 Up on the roof. It's getting real crowded.
4983061 4984521 [music intensifies]
4986523 4987732 Whoa, whoa, whoa.
4998618 5000203 Rox, I could use a hand.
5000286 5001579 On my way, Mike.

5001663 5005625 Oh! Oh, I drop that, and it smashes,

5005709 5007002 You don't get to go home.
5007877 5009796 You having second thoughts, huh?
5009879 5011631 Hey! No safety rope?

5012132 5015010 My foreman would have your ass.

5015093 5017637 Here, here, here.
Come and get it. Come on.
5017721 5019222 You want it? Come get it.
5023560 5024436 [tiles clatter]

5027397 5029566 -[music intensifies]
-[gunshots ricocheting]

5084120 5085663 -You're welcome!
-[man groans]
5085747 5086748 You're welcome!
5092462 5094172 [music fades out]
5098301 5100303 Try to hold onto this this time, okay?

5103932 5107602 -I told you I got a couple of guys.
-Let's see if you can get some more.
5114901 5115860 That's enough, Rox.

5116611 5118321 -That's enough.
-[tense music fading in]
5118404 5120907 Now give me the intel or lose her forever.
5122200 5123201 Take the shot, Mike.
5123993 5126329 [Nick] You do not have the shot, Mikey.
5126412 5128373 [Rox] Go ahead, Mike. Do it.
5131960 5133044 [Rox] Go ahead, Mike.
5133128 5135547 [Nick] Be a good boy. Come on.
5137132 5138299 [music intensifies]
5142762 5143721 [gun clatters]

5144889 5147433 You had the shot.
You're just too chickenshit to take it.
5147517 5148476 [tires screech]
5148560 5150145 [dramatic music playing]

5157277 5160280 ["Another Night" by Real McCoy
playing on car radio]
5160363 5161698 [driver] Hey. Hey!
5165451 5166369 Whoa, whoa, whoa.

5172625 5175420 ["Money On The Dash"
by Elley Duhé & Whethan on car radio]
5175503 5177088 Stop, stop, stop, stop, stop!
5177172 5179299 Hi, sir. Hi. Here, let me help you out.

5179382 5181426 Come on. There you go.
Thank you very much.

5181509 5184095 I will take good care of her.

5186806 5189309 [cross-fades into dramatic music]
5196024 5196858 [tires screech]
5203948 5205241 [music intensifies]
5215627 5216461 [tires screech]

5240276 5241194 [tires screech]

5253164 5254540 -[engine starts]

5265927 5267679 Mike! Where are you?
5270974 5272558 What do you mean you don't know?
5272642 5273768 I'm in the trunk.
5274269 5275436 In the trunk?
5277563 5278690 [car horns blaring]

5286322 5288783 -Give it up, Nicky!
-You know I got the better car!
5288866 5291661 [laughs] It's not about the car, baby!
5291744 5293288 It's about the driver!

5323985 5325778 -What?
-[Mike groaning over radio]

5330116 5331826 Well, get outta the trunk, Mike!

5331909 5333411 -[foot banging]

5346257 5347592 [foot banging]
5349552 5350762 [music intensifies]
5358853 5359812 [car horn blaring]
5362940 5364150 [Mike grunting]
5372825 5374660 Mike, get back in the car!

5378164 5380124 -What?
-Get back in the car, Mike!
5390259 5391427 [music subsides]
5407902 5409362 Rox, where are ya? Let's go.
5409445 5411155 I'm heading north up the coast!
5411239 5412615 You still in the game?
5412698 5414617 Yeah, I'm back in the game, Rox!
5415451 5416536 I'm back in the game.
5416619 5417995 [music intensifies]
5425628 5426963 Here you go, bitch!

5433886 5435555 -Goddamn it.
-[engine cranks]
5438558 5439600 [engine cranking]
5444063 5446065 Rox, are you taking a breather? Come on!

-[car revs]
5449819 5451195 [music intensifies]
5488357 5489400 [distant crash]
5502747 5503998 [car engine receding]
5511047 5511964 [quavering] Mike.
5515134 5517136 [Mike sighs, groans]
5523017 5525102 What-- You-- You're alive?
5525186 5527647 Oh my God. Car started swerving.

5528147 5530441 I remember my training,

5530983 5533236 I just screamed,

5533319 5536072 It was actually pretty cool.

5538574 5539742 Why'd you stop?
5541577 5543663 'Cause I thought you were dead, asshole!

5544247 5546666 Aw! I didn't know you cared!

5546749 5548584 You know what?
You shoulda stayed in the car!

5548668 5552046 Hey, I almost died.

5552129 5553422 A little softer side.
5553506 5554882 [door shuts, engine starts]

5559720 5561556 [dramatic music playing]

5567186 5571190 Well, we can't let that happen.

5571274 5572483 Bang a right here.
5592712 5593754 [music subsides]
5602096 5603180 [car engine roaring]

5609145 5611355 -Okay, when I say "jump," jump, okay?
-Okay!
5614066 5616027 No! Wait! It's stuck! Oh!
5627330 5628831 You threw a car at me?!
5629415 5631709 Hands on your head and hit the ground!

5632543 5635087 Hey, I'm gonna strangle you to death

5636005 5639342 -Get on the floor now, asshole!

5639425 5641677 Oh, that's exactly
how it's goin' down, Nicky.
5641761 5643721 That's not how this is goin' down, Rox!
5646599 5647683 Look at this!
5648934 5650186 Look at where we are!
5651604 5652730 Ain't it beautiful?

5653981 5657526 I'm not gonna spend the rest of my life
in a cage, Rox. No way.
5657610 5659487 Goddamn it, Nick! Hit the ground!
5659570 5661072 We could still sell it!
5661822 5663949 Hundreds of millions of dollars!
5665242 5666118 That could be us!
5666202 5668245 He's full of shit, Rox, and you know it.
5668329 5669872 We could disappear.

5670456 5673751 Travel the world like we always…
like we always dreamed about.
5674502 5676420 Funny thing I learned about me.
5676504 5677380 I'm a homebody.
5678255 5679924 [tense music building]
5704740 5706575 He didn't give you much choice, Rox.
5726303 5727763 [laughter, applause]
5727847 5729306 Look, we all know

5729390 5732101 you can never predict

5732184 5735020 Sometimes they meet in high school,

5735104 5738566 -Sometimes they meet at a bar in Jersey…
-[laughter]

5738649 5741152 …one of them gets drunk

5744697 5748242 And thankfully, somebody else
happens to be the bartender,
5748325 5750953 and she has to drive his sorry ass home.

5751620 5754498 When I heard they were tying the knot,

5754582 5757001 We were absolutely relieved.

5757084 5760796 Finally, somebody was crazy enough
to take this guy off of our hands.

5762214 5765092 No, seriously. I love ya,

5765176 5767762 Congratulations.

5768596 5769680 [Bobby] Mike, cheers!
5769764 5771223 [rock music playing in venue]

5783652 5785571 -Get ready for me.
-[Billy] You got it.
5787072 5787948 Nice speech.

5791410 5793204 I didn't know you crash weddings

5793287 5795164 I told you I was a homebody.

5799335 5800920 -So do you.
-Thank you.
5802880 5804673 So, uh, this is a
5805716 5806842 good turnout.
5809261 5811722 Wait, is… is that Ms. Hoffman?

5811806 5813182 -No. No, don't.

5821774 5824527 -Oh, Nicole. Oh, right, Nicole.
-Yeah, Nicole.
5824610 5826278 You know, Nicole looks good.

5826362 5829198 -You had to do that, didn't you?
-I'm sorry, yes.

5829281 5832618 ["This Will Be (An Everlasting Love)"
by Natalie Cole playing]

5838916 5841585 -[Bobby] Mike, get out here!

5841669 5844630 You know, Rox,
when I was up on that mountain,
5844713 5846173 and you thought I was dead…

5847174 5850845 …even though Faraday might have got away,

5851971 5852930 And your point is?
5853514 5855182 Nothing. I mean, I just…

5856100 5858853 -I think I saw a few tears there.

5861230 5863232 -Well, what about you?
-What?
5863315 5865025 When Faraday had the gun to my head,

5865109 5867152 you could have taken a shot,

5869238 5870322 It was too risky.
5871782 5873117 I gave you permission.

5873742 5875995 I don't care.

5877580 5879248 I don't wanna mess up your hair.

5882084 5885963 You know, I think I saw

5890384 5891594 Are you serious?
5891677 5892678 Yes, I'm serious.
5892761 5894054 Let's go now. Now!

5899184 5902688 ♪ Filled it with happiness I never knew ♪

5909445 5910905 I didn't invite him.

5913782 5917202 But first… we need a little vacation.

5917286 5918996 -Yeah.

85126 89339 Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
Welcome to Trieste, Italy.

89422 92258 Looks like we've got a storm rolling in
off the Adriatic

92342 97430 and a missing CIA agent in room 620
of the Grand Hotel Castelletto.
97514 99516 This is London HQ.
99599 101476 We got a live feed up and running,
101559 102936 and we are good to go.

103019 105647 This is Faraday.
Pickup crew on the sixth floor.
105730 108108 - Agent Hall, you have the field. - Copy that, boss.
108191 110568 Pickup team, give the signal when you're in position.

110652 114739 Forty-five seconds. I wanna be in and out.
Vehicle team, be ready to move.
114823 115782 In position.

115865 118493 Remember, I want
this piece of shit alive, Brennan.

118576 121871 Yeah. What is he,
a ringer on your CIA softball team?
121955 123123 In position.
123665 124707 Try not to shoot the guy.

124791 127001 You wanna pick up the tab
for his minibar too?

127085 130255 Yeah, yeah. Get a receipt.
I'm sure Langley will reimburse.
130755 132966 Okay, everybody. Stand by.
135343 137262 Faraday, ready to breach.

138513 140098 - On your knees!

149566 150900 Hog-tied and ready to ride.
155363 156990 Confirmed. We have the hard drive.
157073 157907 Go for extraction.

163705 166124 I was gonna go to the embassy
and hand myself in.
166624 168918 Well, good news. We saved you a trip.
169002 170712 Traveling on the stairwell.

170795 173464 - Heads up, Rayner, they're coming to you.
- Copy that.
178636 180263 Five seconds until the exit.
189480 190732 What the hell happened?

Go out the back.
196154 197572 What's going on?!
199532 200909 What's our play?

202744 206789 - Backup extraction point at the canal!
- Better not lose that intel, Brennan.

213213 214672 - He's hit!
- Glover's gone!
214756 216216 - Call for backup! - Who is it?
216299 217383 We're taking fire!

217467 220220 Hold your position.
I can get ground support in five minutes.
220303 222222 - We can get to the canal in three. - You'll be in the open.

222305 223932 Seriously, Rox.
You gotta trust me on this.
226309 227769 Okay. Green light.
227852 229312 - Go! - Let's move! Come on!

229395 231231 - Get him outta here!
- On me!
235985 237111 Oh my God! Please!
237195 239739 Faraday, do you copy? Nick, do you copy?
239822 241950 Does anybody copy? Anybody?
242033 244702 - Faraday, what's your location? - Nick, where are you?
257799 261052 I'm at the extraction point. I have the asset.
290665 294585 ...time to go over to Dan for today's outlook right across Jersey.
294669 296921 Thank you, Mitch. I'm Dan Farrell...

299966 301926 - Shit.
- I've made you coffee.
307265 308516 Are you kicking me out?

308599 311477 I'm too old for small talk
in the morning, Michael.

311978 315732 Last night was fun,
but... it ain't last night no more.
317150 318943 Goddamn, Nicole. That's cold.

324282 327410 Hey. When we first met,
did you ever think we'd hook up?

327493 332290 Uh, I was your seventh grade
English teacher, Mike. So... no.
332373 333875 You always passed me.

336044 339756 Look at you. You're still educating me
all these years later.
344427 345845 I'll see you around, huh?
345928 347972 I imagine so!

355897 357398 - Hey, Ma.
- Hey, honey.

358775 361235 That's a really nice suit.
You still working uptown?

361319 364655 - Gary works at the bank.
- Like as a teller?
364739 365823 Like as a manager.
373164 375875 ♪ When I wake up in the mornin', love ♪
378127 381130 ♪ And the sunlight hurts my eyes ♪
382965 385843 ♪ And something without warnin', love ♪
387720 390223 ♪ Bears heavy on my mind... ♪

392642 394936 - Hey, Ma.
- Nicole Hoffman.

396062 398606 Jesus, Ma, you're like the feds.
You got eyes everywhere?

398689 401776 There's no secrets from your mother.
Not in Jersey.
402485 404987 Is her Gary still working at the bank?

405071 408199 No, they fired him. He's selling hot dogs
outside The Rock now.
408282 409826 It's kinda sad, actually.
409909 412161 When's the date for Ronnie's wedding?
412245 413496 A few weeks.

413579 417083 No, I need to know the exact date.
I have to make my appointments.

417166 419168 - For what?
- For the right nail tech.

419252 423965 You gotta book these things in advance.
I don't want them to stick me with Josie.

424549 426968 - Oh, not Josie, huh?
- Don't be smart, kid.

427635 430721 - When's the wedding?
- Two weeks from Sunday. Bye.
438813 443234 ♪ On a rattlesnake speedway In the Utah desert ♪
443317 447113 ♪ I pick up my money And head back into town ♪

464046 467884 ♪ But pretty soon, little girl I'm gonna take charge ♪
467967 471846 ♪ The dogs on Main Street howl 'Cause they understand ♪
471929 476267 ♪ If I could take one moment Into my hands ♪
476350 480730 ♪ Mister, I ain't a boy, no, I'm a man ♪
480813 484901 ♪ And I believe in a promised land ♪
485401 488321 ♪ I've done my best To live the right way... ♪
489238 490490 Mrs. Hoffman?!
490573 494118 Ms. Hoffman, if you don't mind. And, yes, I did. Twice.

494202 496037 - Wow.
- One and a half times at least.
496120 497705 I don't remember her from school.

497788 500333 If you didn't cut class every day,
maybe you'd remember.

500416 503169 If older women are your thing,
I know a couple of smoke shows
503252 505129 that play mahjong with my grandmother.
505213 506589 I'd love to date your grandmother.

506672 508508 If you don't mind
having dinner at 4:30.

508591 510384 - Oh!
- Why so late?

510885 513137 Hey, no, no, no.
No, no, no, no. I got this.
513221 515014 How, brother? You're as broke as me.

515097 517892 First, nobody's as broke as you.
You can barely pay attention.

517975 521521 And secondly, I got an advance today,
so it's all good.

521604 522897 - Thanks, Mike.
- Yeah.

522980 525316 - All right. I gotta drain the hog!
- You do that.

525399 527485 I didn't know you got an advance.
Good for you.
527568 530821 What is this guy, dumb and ugly? There's no advance. I'm broke as shit.

530905 534325 Billy's out of work. We'll split this.
Come on. Break out the lunch money.
535368 538120 Gotta be honest, Rox. Not sure why this is our man.
538204 540248 I got a good feeling about him, boss.

540331 544168 If he's anything like that guy I remember,
he's exactly who we need.

544252 547046 - Hey, Jimmy. I need another.
- Sure thing, Mike.

552885 556764 First one to get a peanut in the glass
behind the bar buys the other one a drink.
562520 565606 Roxanne Hall. What are you doing here?

565690 568359 What does it look like I'm doing here?
I'm getting a drink!

570319 572405 - So, what, you're here by yourself?
- Yeah.
576033 576993 Date night?

577702 581247 I'm sorry. It's just...
it's just this is such a surprise, is all.

581330 584375 What's a surprise to me is you still got
the same haircut since high school.
584458 586043 Hey, hey, don't knock Supercuts.

586752 588337 - Two shots, please.
- You got it.

588421 590798 - You can handle your liquor now?
- I always handled my liquor.

590881 593175 I got a vomit-stained tuxedo
that says different, but...

593259 595177 Wait, you still got your tuxedo
from high school?
596429 597555 And it still fits.
599140 601142 This is so crazy.

601225 604437 I mean, I just... I pictured you walking
through that door a thousand times.
604520 605646 Is it as you imagined?

605730 607690 In my head,
you were always wearing a bikini, but...

610985 613362 Do you still breakdance
outside the rec center?

613446 616741 Every Saturday. And you know what?
The girls still love it too.
616824 618909 I don't remember any girls lovin' it.

618993 621829 - What about Isabella Mingarelli?
- She only liked you 'cause I liked you.

621912 624707 - You know this.
- No, she liked my moves. You know, that...

628210 631339 Oh my God.
She has six kids with Matty Museo.

632173 634216 - And another one on the way.
- What about you?

634300 635426 - What about me?
- You got kids?

635509 637845 Do I have kids?
No, I don't have any... Do you?
637928 639805 Well, I don't know. None that I know of.

643434 645853 Looks like
you're losing your touch.

645936 648189 I forgot how good
these disco fries actually were.

648272 651359 You forgot about a lot of good things
when you went off to college.
651442 653444 I guess Paterson didn't suit you, huh?

654487 657823 - I don't think college did either.
- I heard about that.
660076 661118 What'd you hear?

661202 665331 You got into a fight with the point guard
of the basketball team before the finals.
665414 666916 Broke his jaw. Got kicked out.

666999 670211 Well, actually, he was the center,
and I broke his nose.
671045 673172 Well, you can take the girl out of Jersey.

673255 676759 No, no, no. Wait. What happened was
he took my best friend on a date.

676842 678636 She couldn't remember a thing
in the morning.

678719 682390 People at school didn't care,
so... what happened happened.
682473 684392 So you threw away your college career?
686602 687520 Traded it in.
691565 693192 For doing the right thing.
694235 696654 What do you say we... call it a night?

697488 700408 What? No, we're just having fun.
You don't wanna finish the game?
700491 702326 I didn't say end the night, Mike.
702410 703494 I mean let's
704787 706247 take it somewhere else.
